Texts.Chs: 正所谓：知己知彼，百战不殆。你没有胜算。
Texts.Eng: It is said, 'know your enemy and know yourself, and you will emerge the victor of a thousand battles'. You cannot hope to win.

Texts.Chs: 看来在得先在你身上试试我刀子是否锋利了！
Texts.Eng: One of the princess' lapdogs! Time to test my blade on you!

Texts.Chs: 所以你就打算闯入我的城堡？多么动听的谎言！
Texts.Eng: So, you invade my village and castle? Audacious indeed!
The princess is mine! Mine! Mine!
